title: Arpeggio: 6th in C# (Shape: E)
content:
# Arpeggio: 6th in C# Major (Shape: E Major)

## Brief Presentation
This arpeggio is based on the 6th degree of the C# Major scale. It follows the notes of the E Major chord played in an arpeggiated sequence. The arpeggio provides a bright and uplifting sound, creating a sense of resolution and completeness.

## Notes and Intervals
The arpeggio includes the following notes and intervals:
- E (root)
- G# (major third)
- B (perfect fifth)

## Genre and Musical Flavor
This arpeggio is commonly used in various genres such as pop, rock, and jazz. It adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to the music, often used to create a sense of harmony and melody.

## Songs
Here are three songs that feature the 6th arpeggio in C# Major (Shape: E):
1. "Hotel California" by Eagles
2. "Every Breath You Take" by The Police
3. "Stairway to Heaven" by Led Zeppelin
